scripts.db:start: docker run --name drizzle-postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mypassword -d -p 5433:5432 postgres
scripts.db:stop: docker stop drizzle-postgres && docker rm drizzle-postgres
scripts.db:restart: bun run db:stop && bun run db:start
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd server && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
